node.title: Super Bowl LIV
node.content:
Super Bowl LIV, the 54th Super Bowl and the 50th modern-era National Football League (NFL) championship game will decide the league champion for the 2019 (100th) season. This game was played on February 2, 2020 at Hard Rock Stadium in Miami Gardens, Florida making the seventh different decade for the Super Bowl. At this event, fieldXers participated in several different venues in preparation for the Super Bowl, including Super Bowl Live, Super Bowl Experience, Super Yacht Village, and the Jim Brown event.

FieldXer Roles

  • FieldXers had the opportunity to serve in various capacities such as guest services, operations and logistics, talent management and transportation management
  • In addition to even specific training on site, FieldXers also completed FieldX 101 and custom client learning modules to prepare them for the client

Success Stories

Clay Coltson, “One of the workers that I had was crying as I said goodbye because of the impact that I had on her while managing our event.”

Power Skills Learned and Applied

Leadership, Communication, Coachability, Teamwork

Training Lessons

FieldX 101 (mindset), NFL Custom Client Learning Module, Event logistics
node._event_location: Hard Rock Stadium Miami Gardens, Florida

node.title: The Northern Trust - PGA Tour
node.content:
About The Event

THE NORTHERN TRUST is the first tournament event of the FedExCup Playoffs and will rotate between Liberty National Golf Club and TPC Boston.THE NORTHERN TRUST heads to Boston, Massachusetts in August 2020 where the top-125 PGA TOUR players will descend upon TPC Boston to compete in the premier event of the FedExCup Playoffs. The return to TPC Boston will mark the 16th time in PGA TOUR history and the first for THE NORTHERN TRUST. TPC Boston’s list of distinguished champions include Tiger Woods, Phil Mickelson, Rickie Fowler, Rory McIlroy, Justin Thomas and many more.

node.title: The TOUR Championship - PGA Tour
node.content:
About The Event

The TOUR Championship is a golf tournament that is part of the PGA TOUR. It has historically been one of the final events of the PGA TOUR season; prior to 2007, its field consisted exclusively of the top 30 money leaders of the past PGA TOUR season. East Lake Golf Club has been the permanent home of the TOUR Championship since 2005. The tournament was first played at East Lake in 1998 and has been held at East Lake 19 times since then. The TOUR Championship is the culminating event of the PGA TOUR Playoffs for the FedEx Cup, with only the top 30 players on the points list qualifying each year. The 2019 TOUR Championship and FedExCup champion is Rory McIlroy.

node.title: WGC FedEx Cup - PGA Tour
node.content:
About The Event

The 2020 WGC-FedEx St. Jude Invitational will be a professional golf tournament which originally was to be held July 2–5 at TPC Southwind in Memphis, Tennessee. It will be the 22nd WGC Invitational tournament, and the third of the World Golf Championships events in 2020.
On April 16, the PGA Tour announced a new revised schedule in relation to the COVID-19 pandemic. This meant that the tournament dates have been rescheduled to July 30 – August 2.

node.title: Battle of the Bands
node.content:
Battle of the Bands was created to celebrate, support, and recognize the excellence of black college marching bands and the unique academic experience offered by Historically Black Colleges and Universities (HBCU). The invitational showcase features musical performances from 8 HBCU marching bands. At this event fieldxers were placed in guest services and registration roles which were key in ensuring guests had positive experiences at the Battle of the Bands event.

FieldXer Roles

  • Guest Services: taking care of the customers inside the venue and leading bands to their seating for pre-event as well as accommodating to needs throughout the event.
  • Registration roles: check-ins and first impressions for the bands as they arrived on site.

Success Stories

Lillie Pearl says that “The excitement upon my teams face while the band performs was priceless. My whole team did a marvelous job making sure each team stayed hydrated and energized throughout the event.”

Power Skills Learned and Applied

Communication, Customer Service, Awareness, Critical Thinking

Training Lessons

Fieldx 101 (Mindset), Customer Service Lesson, Battle of the Bands customized training.
node.imagetitle: Battle of the Bands Event Recap|Battle of the Bands Success Story

node.title: Kentucky Derby
node.content:
Time & Venue

OAKS DAY: Friday, September 4, 2020 @ 8:00 a.m. EST

RACE DAY: Saturday, September 5, 2020 @ 8:00 a.m. EST

VENUE: Churchill Downs, Louisville, KY

About The Event

The Kentucky Derby is a horse race held annually in Louisville, Kentucky, United States, on the first Saturday in May, capping the two-week-long Kentucky Derby Festival. The Oaks (Friday) and the Derby (Saturday) are the oldest continuously contested sporting events in history, and the only horse races to be held at their original site since its conception. 

The 2020 Kentucky Derby will be the 146th Kentucky Derby and is dubbed "The Run for the Roses," stemming from the blanket of roses draped over the winner. It is also known as "The Most Exciting Two Minutes in Sports" because of its approximate duration. The Kentucky Oaks is considered by some to be among the most popular horse races in American horse-racing society due to its high attendance. The Kentucky Derby and Kentucky Oaks both are for three-year-old steeds. The Oaks is a gender-specific race, allowing only 3-year-old female horses, or fillies, to qualify and compete and The Derby is for both genders.

node.title: Ryder Cup
node.content:
Time & Venue

TOURNAMENT TIMES: Postponed 2020 to September 21-26 2021

VENUE: Whistling Straits Course - Kohler, Wisconsin

About The Event

Since 1927, the Ryder Cup has become one of the world’s greatest sporting events. Every two years, 24 of the best players from Europe and the United States go head-to-head in match play competition. Each of the first two days includes one four-match session of four-ball and one four-match session of foursomes. The final day is reserved for 12 singles matches. Drama, tension, incredible golf, camaraderie and sportsmanship are served in equal measure, captivating an audience of millions around the world.

node.title: 2021 Formula 1 United States Grand Prix
node.content:
Time & Venue

Times: 2020 EVENT POSTPONED UNTIL 2021 due to COVID-19 pandemic

Venue: Circuit of Americas, Austin, Texas

About The Event

Formula One (also known as Formula 1 or F1) is the highest class of single-seater auto racing sanctioned by the Fédération Internationale de l'Automobile (FIA). Formula One cars are the fastest regulated road-course racing cars in the world, owing to very high cornering speeds achieved through the generation of large amounts of aerodynamic downforce. 

IMPORTANT NOTE FROM CIRCUIT OF AMERICAS: "After ongoing discussions and close collaboration with our partners we can confirm that due to the fluid nature of the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, local restrictions and the importance of keeping communities and our colleagues safe, the F1 United States Grand Prix will not take place this year.

"The cancellation is prudent, but painful. After a sold out 2019, advance ticket sales deposits were up nearly 250 percent over the prior year, and our staff was preparing our biggest event ever. We had secured blockbuster performers for the evening shows, and the racing this year is fantastic. I'm disappointed for the fans, COTA employees, our community, and everyone in the Formula One Paddock, as I believe we all look forward to what has become a wonderful annual tradition. It is my hope that the pandemic will soon pass and we will celebrate 2021 with the greatest Formula One United States Grand Prix ever!" -Bobby Epstein, COTA Chairman and Owner

"We want to pay tribute to our incredible partners in the Americas and look forward to being back with them next season when they will once again be able to thrill millions of fans around the world.”  -Chase Carey, Chairman and CEO of Formula 1

Information regarding the 2021 United States Grand Prix will be released later at a later date.
node.imagecaption: |CIRCUIT OF THE AMERICAS, UNITED STATES OF AMERICA - FEBRUARY 12: Josef Newgarden, Team Penske Chevrolet during the COTA February testing at Circuit of the Americas on February 12, 2020 in Circuit of the Americas, United States of America. (Photo by Barry Cantrell / NKP / LAT Images)

node.title: Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show
node.content:
Time & Venue

Day 1: Wednesday, October 28 @ 12:00 p.m. - 7:00 p.m. EST

Day 2: Thursday, October 29 @ 10:00 a.m. - 7:00 p.m. EST

Day 3: Friday, October 30 @ 10:00 a.m. - 7:00 p.m. EST

Day 4: Saturday, October 31 @ 10:00 a.m. - 7:00 p.m. EST

Day 5: Sunday, November 1 @ 10:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. EST

Venue: Bahia Mar Fort Lauderdale Beach 

About The Event

Fort Lauderdale, Florida, the "Yachting Capital of the World" will host the 61st annual Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show on October 28 - Nov 1, 2020.  Every year, the show exhibits a vast array of the industry's latest boats and yachts of all sizes, worldwide debuts, plus a medley of marine products and accessories to enhance the nautical lifestyle.

The show draws an impressively diverse, international crowd of buyers, sellers and new entrants to the boating community who come to see the latest that the global boating industry has to offer and to do business. One thousand exhibitors and more than 1,200 boats are on display each November at the exhibition widely regarded as the industry’s top annual boating event.

node.title: The Masters Tournament
node.content:
Time & Venue

PRE-TOURNAMENT: Monday, April 5,2021 @ 8:00 a.m. EST

PRE-TOURNAMENT: Tuesday, April 6, 2021 @ 8:00 a.m. EST

PRE-TOURNAMENT: Wednesday, April 7, 2021 @ 8:00 a.m. EST

ROUND 1: Thursday, April 8, 2021 @ 8:00 a.m. EST

ROUND 2: Friday, April 9, 2021 @ 8:00 a.m. EST

ROUND 3: Saturday, April 10, 2021 @ 8:00 a.m. EST

ROUND 4: Sunday, April 11, 2021 @ 8:00 a.m. EST

VENUE: Augusta National Golf Club

About The Event

The Masters Tournament is one of the four major championships in professional golf. Scheduled for the first full week of April, the Masters is the first major of the year, and unlike the others, it is always held at the same location, Augusta National Golf Club, a private course in the southeastern United States, in the city of Augusta, Georgia. The 2020 Masters Tournament will be the 84th edition of the Masters Tournament and was originally scheduled as the first of golf's four major championships to be held in 2020. Originally scheduled for April 9–12 at Augusta National Golf Club in Augusta, Georgia, the tournament was postponed due to the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic.[1] On April 6, Augusta National announced the tournament would be held November 12–15.

node.title: 2020 MotoGP Red Bull Grand Prix of the Americas
node.content:
Time & Venue

Times: Cancelled 2020 and Rescheduled for 2021: TBA

Venue: Circuit of Americas, Austin, Texas

About The Event

Get back in the saddle when the fastest show on two wheels revs up Austin, Texas for three days of bar-banging motorcycle racing action with the greatest riders in the world!  Moto2, Moto3, and MotoAmerica fill out the grid at the only North American stop of the world's premier motorcycle racing series.

Grand Prix racing in the US has a long history at legendary tracks such as Daytona, Laguna Seca and Indianapolis. In 2013, the impressive new Hermann Tilke-designed 5.513km 'Circuit of The Americas' in Austin, Texas, joined the MotoGP™ calendar and become an instant hit - with its cutting edge facilities and a capacity for 120,000 fans.

node.title: Super Bowl LV
node.content:
Time & Venue

SUPER BOWL GAME: Sunday, February 7, 2021 @ 6:30 PM ET

SUPER BOWL LIVE: TBA

SUPER BOWL EXPERIENCE: TBA

CELEBRITY FOUNDATION EVENTS: TBA

VENUE: Various

About The Event

Super Bowl LV, the 55th Super Bowl where the National Football League (NFL) championship game will decide the league champion for the league's 2020 and 101st season. The game is scheduled to be played on February 7, 2020 at Raymond James Stadium in Tampa, Florida. This is the 5th time Super Bowl has been hosted in Tampa Bay and the 4th time at Raymond James Stadium. The Super Bowl Game is just one aspect of this world class event.  Check here for more details as they develop.

node.title: Palm Beach International Boat Show
node.content:
Time & Venue

FINAL FOUR 1st-ROUND: Saturday, April 3, 2021 @ TBA

CHAMPIONSHIP: Monday, April 5, 2021 @ TBA

VENUE: West Palm Beach Waterfront

About The Event

Ship ahoy, mates! Find all things nautical, from megayachts to maritime swag, at one of America's premier yachting events. Showcasing more than a billion dollars' worth of boats, yachts and accessories from the world's leading manufacturers, this waterfront event is "shore" to impress! 

The 36th annual Palm Beach International Boat Show is one of the top five boat shows in the country. The show will feature more than $1.2 billion worth of yachts and accessories, including hundreds of boats ranging from 8-foot inflatables to super yachts nearly 300 feet in length. 

If you need a boat, want a boat or just fantasize about boats, the Palm Beach International Boat Show is the place to be. An unprecedented number of vessels are on display, be it Cigarette, Comanche or Super Cat; inflatable, cruiser or runabout; fishing, high performance or yacht. You'll also find nautical-themed everything, from that special trinket or accent piece for the family room to clothing and sailing paraphernalia – all displayed amid the balmy breezes of downtown West Palm Beach.

node.title: NCAA® Men's Final Four
node.content:
Time & Venue

NEXTGEN OF SONG MASTERCLASS: TBA

NEXTGEN PROGRAM: Hosted on one day between Monday, March 29 – Monday, April 5, 2021 

FINAL FOUR 1st-ROUND: Saturday, April 3, 2021 @ TBA

CHAMPIONSHIP: Monday, April 5, 2021 @ TBA

VENUE: Lucas Oil Stadium, Indianapolis, IN

About The Event

The 2021 NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament is a planned single-elimination tournament of 68 teams to determine the men's National Collegiate Athletic Association (NCAA) Division I college basketball national champion for the 2020–21 NCAA Division I men's basketball season. The 82nd edition of the tournament is scheduled to begin on March 16, 2021, and will conclude with the championship game on April 5 at Lucas Oil Stadium in Indianapolis, Indiana. Check here for more details as they develop. The 2021 NCAA Men's Final Four will be played at Lucas Oil Stadium in Indianapolis, Indiana with the National Semifinals being played April 3 and the National Championship tipping off on April 5. Leading up to the game, there are many other events during the week - stay tuned as the calendar fills.

node.title: 2021 Olympic Games
node.content:
Time & Venue

Times: Friday, July 13 - Sunday, August 8, 2021 @ TBA

Venue: The Tokyo Games will use as many existing competition venues as possible, namely those built for the Games in 1964, such as the prestigious Nippon Budokkan for judo, the Baji Koen Park for equestrian events, and the Yoyogi National Gymnasium for handball. The Tokyo National Stadium, where the Opening and Closing Ceremonies and athletics competitions will be staged, will be completely revamped and replaced by a new arena.

About The Event

Fifty-seven years* after having organised the Olympic Games, the Japanese capital will be hosting a Summer edition for the second time. The Games in 1964 radically transformed the country. According to the organisers of the event in 2021, the Games of the XXXII Olympiad of the modern era will be “the most innovative ever organised, and will rest on three fundamental principles to transform the world: striving for your personal best (achieving your personal best); accepting one another (unity in diversity); and passing on a legacy for the future (connecting to tomorrow)”.

Japan has been an Olympic land since the Summer Games of 1964, which were the first to be staged in Asia. In 2021, the country will host its fourth Games, if we include the Winter Games of 1972 in Sapporo and of 1998 in Nagano.

*Due to the Covid-19 outbreak, the Olympic Games Tokyo 2020 were postponed for the first time in their history. The Opening Ceremony of the Olympic Games Tokyo 2020 will now be held on 23 July 2021.

Micro-internships may range from 1 to 14 days (perfect for busy schedules). Learners can apply for roles that are posted once they have completed fieldX101*


Sign up now! Start training, get notified and be ready when events are confirmed, and positions are posted.
 
fieldX micro-learning and micro-internships build your capability for any discipline. Sport, marketing, media, hospitality, nursing, computer science, criminal justice; anyone in any discipline who wants to power up their transferable skills and get work experience!

Training:

  • fieldX101 Lessons
  • Reopen Responsibly Lessons

​

NOTE:
The safety and well-being of our fieldXers has been and always will be fieldXperience’s highest priority, especially during challenging times like these. We will provide updates, changes or cancellations as announced.

We strongly recommend following guidelines set by the CDC 

Learners can apply after receiving a score of 100% in prerequisite lessons

(lessons can be repeated to improve scores).

Micro-internships may range from 1 to 14 days (perfect for busy schedules).

Learners can apply for roles that are posted once they have completed fieldX101

node.title: Forbes Travel Guide Luxury Summit
node.content:
Forbes Travel Guide Luxury Summit is the celebration of the winners from professional inspectors who travel the world assessing hotels, restaurants, and spas based on 900 objective standards. This Travel Guide is the global authority in luxury travel and our 9 fieldxers were first class in celebrating the winners. Their roles ranged from guest services, registration, operations, and escorts for talent for on stage performances or meet and greets offstage.

FieldXer Roles

  • Guest Services: taking care of the customers inside the venue and checking in on individuals for five star service with refreshments, gifts or other overall client experience.
  • Talent Handlers: Escort talent around the venue for celebration activities
  • Operations and Logistics: Professionally executing on the plan to help the celebration run smoothly.

Success Stories

Tris’styn Williams enjoyed the sense of teamwork and comradery that developed while she was working the event, saying, “I feel like everyone was easy to get along with! I loved meeting and talking to everyone, and I feel everyone worked together when they were able to reach a common goal.”

Power Skills Learned and Applied

Communication, Teamwork, Customer Service, Efficiency

Training Lessons

Fieldx 101 (Client Experience), Customer Service Lesson, Forbes Summit customized training.

node.title: Bruce Arians Family Foundation Celebrity Golf Classic
node.content:
Bruce Arians Celebrity Golf Classic, an annual golf tournament held for the Arians family foundation. This event was the final year in Phoenix as Coach Arians is headed to Tampa to lead the Buccaneers. Our FieldX team not only worked the golf day but also a silent auction with dinner and celebrity guest singers Jordan Smith and Mary Sarah. This was an incredible event to work with the CMPR Team. Throughout the event we helped with setup on the course, take down, goods to vendors, whatever any golfer needed we provided it.

FieldXer Roles

  • Guest Services and Hospitality: taking care of the customers inside the venue and the course with beverages, giveaways, overall professional care.
  • Security and Transportation: Behind the scenes talent help, transportation to course and back, goods for different venues.
  • Operations and Logistics: Professionally executing on the plan to help the celebration of the Arians Foundation run smoothly.

Success Stories

Luke Konkel says, “This was one of the best events that I have been given the opportunity to work. Once we figured out who worked well together, we made this an event to remember giving first class experience to an amazing family foundation.”

Power Skills Learned and Applied

Communication, Teamwork, Flexibility, Hospitality

Training Lessons

Fieldx 101 (Client Experience), Golf Cart Etiquette, Event training

node.title: NBC The Voice
node.content:
The Voice, is an singing competition television show in which contestant are selected to be on the team of a well known singer and performer. Contestants are then slowly dismissed weekly, as determined by viewer’s votes, until a champion is crowned. FieldXers were able to work this highly anticipated event in several different capacities such as accompanying judges/contestants down the red carpet and onto back stage and ensuring checkpoint volunteers are organized effectively.

FieldXer Roles

  • Guest Services and Hospitality: taking care of the customers inside the venue and the course with beverages, giveaways, overall professional care.
  • Security and Transportation: Behind the scenes talent help, transportation to course and back, goods for different venues.
  • Operations and Logistics: Professionally executing on the plan to help the celebration of the Arians Foundation run smoothly.

Success Stories

Kate Kirchoff says, “As of 24 hours, I just walked across the stage and got my college degree in marketing from Concordia Ann Arbor. Few hours later, hopped on a plane to work the Voice Finally.”

Power Skills Learned and Applied

Communication, Leadership, Friendliness, Attention to Detail

Training Lessons

Fieldx 101 (Client Learning), Crowd Managers certificate, The Voice specific site training

node.title: California Strong Celebrity Softball Game
node.content:
The California Strong Celebrity Softball Game is a charity event led by athletes Christian Yelich, Ryan Braun, Mike Moustakas, and Jared Goff to help raise money and awareness of recent tragedies and disasters that have plagued California and its citizens. FieldXers worked with celebrities such as Adam Sandler, Jamie Foxx, Brad Paisley, Colton Underwood, Justin Turner, Baker Mayfield, and more to ensure the smooth running of events for both participants and fans alike.

FieldXer Roles

  • The roles for fieldXers include, Talent Wranglers, Media Relations Assistants, Red Carpet Operations Assistants, Event Ambassadors, Celebrity Registration, VIP Event Operations
  • There were a lot of moving parts to this event but our fieldXers prepared well through online tools to then execute using each other’s expertise to make this an amazing experience for all.

Success Stories

Steve Scott says, “I had an amazing time working with fieldX and am still in awe of all of the events that took place this weekend.  The training that we received prepared us for success and really helped to feel connected to the California Strong team.  Thank you so much for the opportunity to learn from such established members of the industry, this was truly a one of a kind experience.”

Power Skills Learned and Applied

Coachability, Leadership, Positive Mindset, Collaboration

Training Lessons

Fieldx 101 (Professionalism), Media Training, California Strong specific site training
node._event_location: Eddy D. Field Stadium, Malibu, California

node.title: Leadercast Women
node.content:
Leadercast Women is an annual, one day conference featuring women speakers sharing their insights on leadership. fieldX sent a team of student ambassadors to enhance professional development and training through both working and attending the event. Specifically, fieldXers served in roles that allowed them to work with catering teams to ensure beverage stations were filled, food was distributed in a timely manner and lines were managed. fieldXers also assisted Leadercast Women speakers by helping manage schedules and cater to needs. Additionally, fieldXers also helped managed marketing of booths.

FieldXer Roles

  • fieldXers had the opportunity to serve in various capacities such as catering managers, talent handlers, and marketing coordinators.
  • In addition to even specific training on site, fieldXers also completed fieldX 101 and custom client learning modules to prepare them for the event.

Success Stories

Kenneth McArdle said, “As volunteers we all felt very included and the integration of us into the team felt quite seamless. The selection of speakers was [also] amazing, they were all very engaging and were well received.

Power Skills Learned and Applied

Coachability, Leadership, Teamwork, Communication

Training Lessons

Fieldx 101 (Professionalism), Media Training, California Strong specific site training

node.title: Riptide Music Festival
node.content:
The Riptide Music Festival is an outdoor music festival that partners with the Celebration of the Sea Foundation in order to promote awareness and stewardship of marine habitats. The event also hopes to inspire young people in fields such as Science, Technology, Resiliency, Engineering, Arts and Math through the draw of music. fieldXers experienced a variety of different tasks while working the event, implementing aspects of their on site and online training.

FieldXer Roles

  • fieldXers had the opportunity to serve in various capacities such Activation Tent Hospitality Managers, Proof of Performance Managers, Social Media Content Creators, VIP Hospitality Hosts, Backstage Production Assistants, and Information Runners.
  • Duties and responsibilities of the above positions included ensuring sponsorship activations ran smoothly, media collection, guest communication, talent coordination, and crowd management.

Success Stories

Kaitlin said, “We’ve focused a lot on communication and problem solving, fixing any potential issues which ensures a successful event”.

Power Skills Learned and Applied

Critical Thinking, Emotional Intelligence, Detail Oriented, Communication

Training Lessons

Fieldx 101 (Client Learning), Riptide specific site training

node.title: COTA Auto Nation
node.content:
COTA Formula 1 Auto Nation, is the pinnacle of motorsports, hosted in Austin, Texas. This long weekend celebrates American Formula 1 racing with every speed and sound that follows each lap. This electric environment includes performances by P!ink and Imagine Dragons. Our fieldXers had a crucial role in the success of this event from the check in to security and talent transportation. This was a highlight for fieldXers as it was a different race behind the scenes than on the track. This team pulled together one of the best events in 2019 and fieldX was proud to play a big role.

FieldXer Roles

  • fieldXers had the opportunity to serve in various capacities such as credential and check-in duties, security in lines, crowds, entrance safety, talent wranglers.
  • In addition to even specific training on site, fieldXers were well prepared to deal with any situation that came their way from fieldX online learning modules.

Success Stories

Catalina Santamaria says, “This is a great experience to network and learn more about yourself and how you work. Truly think this will help so many students to come.”

Power Skills Learned and Applied

Flexible, Leadership, Teamwork, Communication

Training Lessons

Fieldx 101, Crowd Manager Certificate, Custom Client Learning
node._event_location: Circuit of the America's, Austin, Texas

node.title: NCAA Final Four 2019
node.content:
NCAA Final Four, is the highlight for March and for the beginning of April. March Madness around the country is one of the biggest events throughout the year. For FieldX to be a big part of this event was critical, in working VIP Events, Leading Talent like Bill Walton throughout the week, logistics and operations at the convention center, pregame events along with in game events around the US Bank Stadium. There were a lot of moving parts but FieldXers banded together and worked hard to make sure this event was a shining moment.

FieldXer Roles

  • There were a lot of different roles for fieldX members to take on but the main roles were VIP guest services, Talent wranglers, Convention Center roles for team check-ins, Media relations, operations and logistics, registration and hospitality.
  • Since the Final Four is such a large event our fieldXers had to be in good communication overseeing different events at different venues.

Success Stories

Anne Gierach says, “The hands-on experience working events like the Final Four have prepared me for many things but it was a step in advancing to where I am now as a Catering Coordinator running events for Delaware North Sportservice at Lambeau Field. FieldX is a steppingstone for students before graduation.”

Power Skills Learned and Applied

Leadership, Energy, Teamwork, Communication

Training Lessons

Fieldx 101, Guest Service Lesson, Final Four specific site training

node.title: World Rugby Championship
node.content:
World Rugby Championship is where 16 compete in two full days of rugby with an international fan festival, with a fancy dress and costume contest included. Crimson Marketing and Public Relations a partner with fieldX gave 3 students an opportunity to work this amazing two-day event. In the heart of Los Angeles at Dignity Health Stadium our fieldX team did not cave to the pressure and executed on the plans that they were given, exceeding expectations and working together for a great experience.

FieldXer Roles

  • fieldXer’s were given roles in assisting with media coverage. Covering check-ins, credentials, bringing athletes to reporters or interviewers to be interviewed, and managed the photographers on the pitch to make sure they followed the guidelines for matchday photography.

Success Stories

Zachary Yoder says, “I had a blast, I learned how big the demographic of sports is outside of just Michigan. I learned about communicating within a team and how crucial it is especially at a big event like World Rugby.”

Power Skills Learned and Applied

Critical Thinking, Leadership, Teamwork, Communication

Training Lessons

Fieldx 101, Media Training, World Rugby specific site training
node._event_location: Dignity Health Stadium, Los Angeles, California

node.title: Wellness Ambassador
node.content:
Wellness Ambassadors were monitoring employees as they came into the lobby of Boston Scientific. fieldXers were placed to direct employees through stanchion where they would have to get their temperature taken, one it is taken, the number is monitored and if over 99.0 then they would have to be directed to another scan to reassess. This was very strategic following government guidelines every step of the way.

FieldXer Roles

  • fieldXer’s were placed in positions of safety to guide staff where professionals could take individuals temperatures, working through the night and during the day. This was a very intense task that our fieldXer’s were given but performed at a very professional level.

Success Stories

fieldXperience Ambassadors were able to help Boston Scientific and Cambria create a safe, welcoming, and confident attitude towards their building environment to have their employees returning to work since April.

Power Skills Learned and Applied

Responsibility, Empathy, Awareness, Communication

Training Lessons

Fieldx 101, Zoom Training, Virtual World Series, Living with COVID19

node.title: A Virtual Power Skills Huddle
node.content:
About the Event and Virtual Work Experience

This new video broadcast series is a 30-minute huddle focusing on Power Skills and their importance for successful careers. Host Fran Fraschilla will engage guest speakers in discussion about the importance of transferable power skills such as mindset, communication and teamwork and how they contributed to the speaker’s career journey.

Fran Fraschilla is currently an ESPN college basketball game and studio analyst. He serves as an analyst primarily on Big 12 Conference men's basketball games.

See our Coach's Corner page for the most recent broadcast and guest information.

Micro-Internships: opportunity to broadcast with an industry leader in sports media.

Sign-up and receive notification as new events and information is released.

Advance your career; learn transferable (soft) skills through our micro-learning program and apply for micro-internships at events like this.

This is a special fieldX micro-learning and micro-internship built for media, communications, broadcast students who wants to power up their transferable skills, get work experience and have amazing video clips interacting with our host and inspirational guests.

Learners can apply for posted roles once they have completed fieldX101* .

Sign up now! Start training, get notified and be ready when events are confirmed, and positions are posted.

Training:

  • fieldX101 Lessons
  • Working and Living in a Virtual World

NOTE:
The safety and well-being of our fieldXers has been and always will be fieldXperience’s highest priority, especially during challenging times like these. We will provide updates, changes or cancellations as announced.

We strongly recommend following guidelines set by the CDC 

*Learners can apply after receiving a score of 100% in prerequisite lessons

(lessons can be repeated to improve scores).

Micro-internships may range from 1 to 14 days (perfect for busy schedules).

Learners can apply for roles that are posted once they have completed fieldX101
node._event_location: This is a Virtual Work Experience
